steps.15: Pour-Pour the sauces over the meatballs
steps.18: Stir-Stir the contents in the microwave with a spoon
steps.20: Microwave-Microwave the plate, covered, on high for 1.5 minutes
steps.21: Place-Place 5 meatballs in a Microwave-safe plate
steps.22: Cut-Cut 1/4 medium carrot into short, thin strips
steps.23: Mix-Mix 1/4 cup sweet-and-sour sauce and 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce in a small bowl
steps.24: Top-Top the plate with the carrots, onion, garlic and 1/4 tsp pepper powder
